column4: hmm. i realize i have alot to learn with ubuntu. always worked with yuck windows, but it was time to change to linux.. i'm afraid i'm a complete n00d with that lol
I was a complete noob 3 weeks ago...Now I help people troubleshoot...Granted, nothing major or crazy, but you learn fast...
This is such a good resource and you would not believe what is on the forums...I mean, almost any problem you have, someone else has had it.
I haven't done irc-scripting in maybe 6-7 years, but I hear that there are other clients better than xchat for irc scripting.
